column4: hi, i'm on ubuntu edgy and i have a webcam which works on my user account (admin), but it doesn't work on other accounts
hi, i'm on ubuntu edgy and i have a webcam which works on my user account (admin), but it isn't even recognized on other accounts
i'm on edgy and i have a webcam which works on my user account (admin), but it isn't even recognized on other accounts; how do i get it to work on all accounts?
admin is *not* a normal user account
